data.message: Facebook was amazing creating these films, I had never felt the difference of not being with my family. Just beautiful, speechless. Everyone should make their movies, and let marked moments of their lives. Fb is that for some would be a curse but for me has been a blessing, keeps me in touch with mine and I can feel by !! With a mega tangle in my throat but super happy !! Good Night my FB friends !! Happy Birthday !!
